BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMMON_AREA_TYPE, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST SET STR_COMMON_AREA_TYPE=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GSTR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO =? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1) WHERE T.NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO =? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMMON_AREA_TYPE, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO =? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO =? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST (NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID, GNUM_SLNO, STR_COMMON_AREA_TYPE, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_OFF_PUR_COMN_TYPE_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_COMMON_AREA_TYPE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.NUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
